actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit veterans to determine how certain drugs and medicines will be supplied to them.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to permit a veteran, who is not a patient in a Veterans' Administration facility, to determine the means whereby such veteran shall be supplied with, or reimbursed for, such drugs or medicines as he may require.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to permit veterans to determine how certain drugs and medicines will be supplied to them.
